items.sentence: Tom just got out of prison and he doesn't want to go back.
I want to know when you're going to come over and help me.
Tom is much closer to his father than he is to his mother.
Maybe you should stay away from me. I might be contagious.
Did you really think I was the one who stole your bicycle?
I'm just following the argument to its logical conclusion.
Tom needs to be alone to think things through for a while.
The movie Tom and I saw yesterday wasn't very interesting.
Life is what happens while you're busy making other plans.
You know how stubborn Tom is. He'll never change his mind.
